items.content_html: ✨Sparkle.js 是一个基于WebGL的HTML5的0依赖轻量级小巧的游戏引擎，让游戏开发变得简单且有趣！ ^_^ Sparkle.js is a lightweight and compact game engine based on WebGL for HTML5 with zero dependencies, making game development simple and fun^_^
